caption.p:
Polyprotein cleavage sites recognised by M pro of SARS-CoV-2, SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV. Peptide sequences cover residues P 5 to P 5â€² according to the nomenclature of Schechter and Berger.
81 Data were generated from pp1ab polyprotein sequences reported in the UniProt database with the accession codes P0DTD1 (SARS-CoV-2), P0C6X7 (SARS-CoV) and K9N7C7 (MERS-CoV). The consensus sequence over all cleavage sites was plotted using WebLogo.
86.
